Ох дбд , с чего бы начать , ну наверное с того , что это самая лучшая игра для нескольких друзей , игра сама поощряет  регулярными победами за проведенные катки вместе. Но отсюда и вытекает один из главных минусов дбд. Дбд не рассчитана на игру через дискорд и другие мессенджеры , в результате чего страдают маны .Графика для игры с такими системниками просто кекс . Багов бывает много , как и спорных решений со стороны разрабов . Читеры как считают многие это главная проблема , так как код игры полностью открыт , но я за свои почти 700ч ни разу не видел читера , как за мана , так и за сурва . Но несмотря на эти минусы игра все равно уникальная в своем роде , она может приносить как радость , так и гнев . А из-за баланса не все смогут насладиться игрой за какую-либо из сторон в виду частых поражений.

Very nice game i did not played it much yet i only played 3 hours but i think this is going to be my most playtime game in future sooo good game just awesome . Must buy

this game is not enjoyable if your planning on playing survivor the servers are absolutely terrible and they are completely killer sided and unfair for the survivor every time you encounter a chase interaction etc. with a killer. And the matchmaking system is also terrible and do not how me and and my friend are deep in green rank but still get paired with yellow and brown ranks it does add up. And its disappointing to play this game cause i see how much potential it has but falls off in these major categories witch in my opinion makes the game suffer severly. The skill gap also takes a hit do to my experience i can work on three gens ( generators ) witch are very important part to escape the killer and my friend all he has to is sit around running the killer in circles and get people off hooks and mabye get half of a gen and get more blood points than me and rank up
way faster. In conclusion this game has a lot of potential and there is really easy fixes devs could do make this game virtually perfect.

There's of course toxic people, a few bugs and whatnot, but besides that the game is great. As of writing this I've mainly played console, and I've achieved the platinum trophy (obtain every other trophy), which can help give a sense that this game has a HIGH replay-ability factor. The amount of killers, survivors, perks, etc always gives incentive to keep playing. This game is amazingly fun and intense, especially with friends. There is a steep learning curve you have to get past, a lot of information to obtain, but you pick up on the basics very quickly. It also has a good dev team, who are nice and responsive.  You can also choose between survivor and killer, so the game never gets too boring too quickly. It's definitely worth it for the amount of money it is.

With balanced gameplay and flexible quality management, Dead By Daylight is the perfect game for a casual player like me who still wants a challenge. Killers and Survivors are constantly polished to make the game balanced and the maps are unique and interesting to play on. There's also a healthy amount of lore and story to help make the survival based game so much more interesting.
really like this game if you love horror and horror games you'll love this.
Good game if you like multiplayer survival horror.  The graphics are meh, the bad guy is OP.  Overall it is a fun game despite a few flaws.
Very fun game... way more difficult than it seems on both types (killer or survivor)

Jogo SIMPLESMENTE PERFEITO, muito divertido e muito bom, os desenvolvedores se preocupam muito com o jogo e trabalham muito neles, a maioria das pessoas que reclamam do jogo São pessoas mimadas com jogos, que so aceitam jogos perfeitos, jogo muitos jogos que em 10 minutos de gameplay eu encontro 4 bugs, jogo DbD a 100 horas e encontrei somente 1 bug, os poucos problemas que eu vejo São: Falta de divulgação, o jogo MUITO escuro(nao da pra ver nada em alguns mapas) e o balanceamento nas partidas(que pode ser explicado pela falta de jogadores). Recomendo Demais o jogo!

Jogo é bem divertido, porem tenho algumas criticas em relação ao balanceamento.. baixei o jogo hj e ja cai com killers avançados que ja sabem perfeitamente como joga e ja tem perks e etc... bom porem tem como ficar melhor!

Good game. If you like horror, then this is the game for you. You can play as survivor or killer. I suggest both. It can be frustrating at times, but what game isn't? The Devs give a new killer and survivor every 4 months. Its a good sign the they work so hard on the game. Well here we are in July 2022, and the game has completely done a 180. This game is no longer fun even with swf. If you wanna dabble in the killer side of the game then now is the time. It is so killer sided at this point I cannot recommend this to be a fun game of any kind. Save your money go play f13

Lots of potential, but obviously made by developers who don't care about their player base. The new killer is a literal dumpster fire. Not even (remotely) fun to play against at all. Pathing and collision issues are constant and never get fixed. All the developers care about is making sure you buy their new DLC, even if it's pure garbage.

Had some fun times, but overall I'm really sad that I spent any real money on this game.

/uninstall

за игру я отдал 450 рублей и получил хер в рожу. Баланс в игре сильно хромает , много багов, маньяки , бьющие на расстоянии , сквозь стены и превращаются в невидимок. вы будучи 8 рангом можете попасть к маньяку со вторым рангом например и оформить хороший такой посос и потерять хорошие улучшения для предметов , в общем миздец а не игра , денег она не стоит я вам отвечаю, только нервы потратите, особенно с последними-то обновлениями в которых добавляют маньяков бьющих на расстоянии и учиться мансить в этой игре стало гораздо сложнее так как каждый раз приходится меняться и подстраиваться
P.S писал этот обзор в тильте , а теперь напишу объективней.

DBD - соревновательный "хоррор" построенный на цели выживших - сбежать и цели убийцы - помешать им.
всего играют 4 выживших и 1 убийца, и чтоб сбежать , требуется завезти 5 генераторов , которые находятся в определенных местах каждой карты.
в DBD , как и в любой соревновательной игре , присутствует своя МЕТА, которая со временем корректируется .
основная цель выживших - это побег , а значит нужно завезти все 5 генераторов без особых потерь и открыть ворота. Но убийца должен помешать и он вынужден контролировать генераторы и убивать выживших. 
Как убийца убивает выжившего ? - тут все не так просто . Когда убийца приближается к выжившему на расстояние до 32м , у выжившего начинается сильное сердцебиение и ему стоит убегать. начинается погоня(основная часть этой игры и каждому , кто хочет научиться играть и получать удовольствие от игры , придется тренироваться) , и как только убийца наносит удар , выживший получает ранение и ускоряется и погоня продолжается , и потом , когда убийца наносит второй удар раненному выжившему , выживший переходит в предсмертное состояние , и убийца уже вешает умирающего выжившего на крюк. весящего выжившего можно спасти , но сделать это можно только 2 раза , на третий раз выживший умирает и у команды остается меньше шансов на побег.
в игре достаточно сильное разнообразие : разные карты , маньяки , выжившие , конструкции для погони(внешне), навыки и предметы. 
Также присутствует прокачка ( получаете новые предметы и навыки ), но она не вносит значительный вклад в шанс победы.
В общем, DBD сложна для новичков , много разных механик и вопросов к игре , также эта игра очень токсична и местами нелогичная , но проблемы которые есть в игре со временем исправляются и игра меняется в лучшую сторону.

Despite it's notable flaws, it remains the best asymmetrical horror game in the industry, and has become something of a Smash-like mega crossover of the who's who in the horror genre. The devs push out systematic, regular updates and the game is only going up from here. Dedicated servers were just added recently and cross platform play and progression are in the works and already partially implemented. Now is a fantastic time to jump onto this game if you've been watching it for some time. The game has never been healthier in terms of balance and polish; I have been playing off and on since the beta.

PROS:

-The game is fun. Gameplay is completely unique and I haven't found any other game that can scratch that Dead by Daylight "itch."
-Balancing is done semi-competently, especially given the asymmetrical nature of the game (which I have never seen balanced effectively in other games). You will see lots of complaints about this but compared to most other games this one does it okay-ish, if a bit slowly.
-Two completely separate gameplay styles means if you get bored of one you can swap to the other (Survivor vs Killer)
-Sheer amount of perks and add-ons give lots of room for fun builds to try across the board.
-Regular updates squash the worst of the bugs (usually) and occasionally even bring brand new mechanics to keep the game from getting too boring.
-Regular DLC add new killers, survivors, and maps to the game every few months.
-Regular events keep the community alive, and the devs regularly engage with the community with things like art contests, giveaways, and streamer promotions.


CONS:

-The DLC is a bit prohibitive to someone just starting out as it's basically impossible to earn all the killers through in-game means, and IIRC the licensed killers (Michael Myers, Leatherface, Pyramid Head, etc) must be purchased with money. Many, many top-tier perks are also locked behind DLC, which sucks.
-There is something of a learning curve on both sides; each killer plays differently and survivors play completely differently than the killers. Playing against a halfway decent survivor will make you feel like a joke of a killer, and playing against a halfway decent killer can make new survivors feel completely hopeless. Both sides are relatively balanced, though, especially at lower levels of play. If anything, the survivors have an advantage if they are cooperating competently. This is made worse since tutorials for basic optimal gameplay concepts like looping, closing loops, mindgames, etc do not exist in favor of in-game text and perks that encourage suboptimal techniques like stealth.
-There are occasional glitches, and some of them can ruin a round completely.
-Matchmaking is a joke. Because survivors can party up together, playing as a new killer can match you against a group of high-level survivors playing with their low-level friend.



I have many, many more hours on the PS4 release and don't plan on stopping playing soon.

Pick it up if it looks interesting, it's well worth the asking price. Currently on sale with a bunch of DLC included for a very reasonable price.

 Bom amigos... Dbd é um jogo complicado.
 Todos sabemos que ele é cheio de bug, tem uma pequena parcela de babacas toxicos e a comunidade interage bastante com os devs... Mas, toda via... A uma demora por parte dos devs em ouvir a comunidade.
 O caso do dbd gira em torno de varios bugs por um motivo bem evidente, os devs não estavam esperando que o jogo fizesse o sucesso que fez e faz até hj.
 Os diversos bugs são os devs mudando o jogo para um script mais atual pois o jogo foi feito em uma script mais simplificado e para fazer está mundança sendo uma empresa mediana enquanto eles "tenta" se manter constantemente atualizados é triste pois o jogo pode ter uma ruina baseada nisso.
 Em suma, Dbd é um jogo "OTIMO" se vc estiver completamente ciente da situação do jogo atuamente, sem contar o esforço maximo que vc terá que fazer para apoiar o jogo.
 
Tenha uma boa diversão!

Es un juego espectacular,el cual te entregara momentos de tension,diversion ,exaltacion,es un juego que se puede recomendar para jugadores casuales en la plataforma. Sus puntos fuertes son el apartado grafico,diseño de personajes,mecanica y modalidad de juego . Cuenta con unos servidores activos y estables en sudamerica,la comunidad no es toxica.
El punto en contra ,seria la venta de demasiados dlcs,lo cual a modo personal ,no encuentro que haga la diferencia.Totalmente recomendado.

2/3/2022 Update: welp, the January Q&A Happened... and you know what people learned, the game is still bad, and the devs don't understand skill in this game, even when their community has a common understanding of what skill can be represented as, and people can have things removed from their accounts or have their accounts silenced on forums when the dev teams receive any sort of criticism. Combine the lack of understanding with their refusal to listen to what the community wants unless they see something that becomes too powerful the day after its released. Even then, the game is written on spaghetti code, they dont have a way to give a truly fun experience for both casual and competitive players. No one is ever going to be satisfied with this game wholeheartedly. Take my advice, don't waste your money on the game. Its clear they don't care about the community, just that the game still has players.  

Original Review:

Is it fun? Yes.
Is it good? Sometimes
Is the community great? Depends where you look.

1126 hours in and I still can't properly give this game a fair rating. You cant give this game a yes or no rating because of how it works. The game is good, but it isn't at all perfect. Its bug ridden with more to find or return after every patch, filled with latency issues, runs on an outdated game engine, has a Skill Based Matchmaking system that doesn't account for perks or add ons that can carry a player to high skill (It tires, but it doesnt account for enough to judge real skill), has no clear win condition defined by the game or the developers, and more times than not the devs don't listen to the community unless its a gamebreaking issue, and even then sometimes they don't listen... but hey, if you can get past that, it does have a vast cast of characters, a high skill curve, lots of cosmetics, can be played with friends or Solo, and has custom games. If that isnt enough, lots of licensed killers and survivors too if you wanna play as your favorite horror game and movie characters. 

With a game like this, you get out what you put in. The game is easy to learn, but takes a long time to master. Im still far from a master on either side, but I've learned a lot after all this time. The game can be fun if you make it fun. It won't always be exactly what you want, but thats ok too. 

My rating of the game is 3.5/5 Iridescent Emblems, strictly because of the downsides of the game. IMO, the game needs to be moved to a newer engine or rebuilt from the ground up with everything included. The game came from an era where the killer was the server, and a lot of functionality and has become a game based on dedicated servers. Since then the old issues are starting to bleed through and are only recently being updated. The game is fun but needs work... lots of work.
